ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 116
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree.  Change the con to reflect the true power of a mob.  They don t have to weaken mobs to do this, or make it a cake walk pansy a$$ game . This would
ygData.messageBody:
I agree. Change the con to reflect the true power of a mob. They don't
have to weaken mobs to do this, or make it a "cake walk pansy a$$ game".
This would make serve to make "conning" meaningful. At the high end of
things, just because PCs can't (currently) go beyond lvl 50, this doesn't
mean that mobs can't. There would still be a challenge and this would not
weaken the game. Keep xp the same for the mobs, but give people a better
feel for its toughness.

-just my opinion
Varlena of the 14th
Rodcet Nife



-----Original Message-----
From: Sheldon Jolson [mailto:Sheldon_Jolson@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 5:00 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 116


From: "Sheldon Jolson" <Sheldon_Jolson@...>



Most of the tough mobs are over level 50. But it shouldn't require a full
group
of
50s to kill a level 45. Or at least change the con system to reflect HP or
something
marginally useful. As it is, the level the mob cons at is utterly
meaningless
aside
from xp considerations. And even then it is seriously out of whack.






"Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...> on 12/07/99 08:24:39 PM

Please respond to EQ-Monks@onelist.com

To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: Sheldon Jolson/TheGuardian)
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 116



From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>

IF mobs were equal to us then how would that be fun? sounds like you want a
cake walk pansy a$$ game that offers no challenge whatsoever. Maybe it is
good your quitting.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th ....
E-marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Greg <greg@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 2:02 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 116


> From: "Greg" <greg@...>
>
> Because Mobs are just a big fuggin joke, thats all.... Or maybe the
players
> are the joke? I can imagine the GMS and Brad laughing at everyone as a
> train of froggies rips through guk and slaughters all the newbies. Mobs
> should be EQUAL in ability to players, so it isn't impossible to kill a
mob
> of your level alone. Good thing I'm quitting EQ anyway.
